Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

trans-unit.source: Amphin Cutthroat
trans-unit.target: 埃分割喉客

trans-unit.source: "The amphin have long built their society in secret. While surface dwellers squabbled over trivial borders, they patiently expanded, building their ammonite temple-caves. Now amphin priests eye the shore, and amphin hunters gird for war."\n—Gor Muldrak, *Cryptohistories*
trans-unit.target: 「埃分一族悄悄壮大自己的社群。 当地面人为着领土界线等琐事打来打去，该族耐心地扩张，建造菊石般相连的殿堂洞穴。 现在埃分僧侣密切注意着岸上，而埃分猎人早已备战。」 ～葛末札，《寰海探秘》

trans-unit.source: Aven Fleetwing
trans-unit.target: 迅翼艾文

trans-unit.resname: M12·44 | Aven Fleetwing | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nHexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 辟邪 （此生物不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.source: "It was too fast, even for our veteran archers. They might as well have been blowing it kisses."\n—Vulok, elvish archer
trans-unit.target: 「他实在太快，连我们的老牌箭手都射不中。 他们应该也已遭了他的殃。」 ～妖精箭手梧洛

trans-unit.source: Azure Mage
trans-unit.target: 碧蓝法师

trans-unit.resname: M12·45 | Azure Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{U}: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {3}{U}：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "We draw our power from the infinite ocean of the mind, where all manner of things can be conceived."\n—Azure creed
trans-unit.target: 「我们自心灵的无垠大海获取力量，万物秩序均构想自该处。」 ～碧蓝信条

trans-unit.source: Belltower Sphinx
trans-unit.target: 钟塔史芬斯

trans-unit.resname: M12·46 | Belltower Sphinx | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever a source deals damage to CARDNAME, that source's controller puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当任一来源对CARDNAME造成伤害时，该来源的操控者将其牌库顶上等量的牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Cancel
trans-unit.target: 取消

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.source: Chasm Drake
trans-unit.target: 深峡龙兽

trans-unit.resname: M12·48 | Chasm Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，目标由你操控的生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Once he's got you, hold on. Fall from a drake and you'll suffer much worse than a bruise."\n—Garl, drake trainer
trans-unit.target: 「被他攫中时，更要撑住。 如果从龙兽身上摔下来，后果就不只是瘀青而已了。」 ～龙兽驯师贾尔

trans-unit.source: Coral Merfolk
trans-unit.target: 珊瑚人鱼

trans-unit.source: Merfolk are best known for their subtle magic. But those who try to fight them in their own territory quickly realize that merfolk are hardly defenseless on the field of battle.
trans-unit.target: 人鱼一向以精巧的法术闻名。 不过在他们地盘与之战斗的人，很快就会发现人鱼在战场上可绝不文弱。

trans-unit.source: Divination
trans-unit.target: 卜卦

trans-unit.source: Draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you."\n—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle
trans-unit.target: 「解开谜题的关键就在你心中。」 ～西北风屿导师多瑞尔

trans-unit.resname: M12·51 | Djinn of Wishes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Djinn of Wishes
trans-unit.target: 祈愿巨灵

trans-unit.resname: M12·51 | Djinn of Wishes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.\n{2}{U}{U}, Remove a wish counter from CARDNAME: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME进战场时上面有三个祈愿指示物。 {2}{U}{U}，从CARDNAME上移去一个祈愿指示物：展示你的牌库顶牌。 你可以使用该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果你不使用，则将它放逐。

trans-unit.source: Flashfreeze
trans-unit.target: 快速冻结

trans-unit.source: Counter target red or green spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标红色或绿色咒语。

trans-unit.source: "Is cold merely the absence of heat, or a force unto itself? Would a display of its power help you decide?"\n—Zubarek, Icewinder Magus
trans-unit.target: 「寒冷是否仅为热气流失的现象，或者它本身就是一股力量？ 要不要展现一下其力量来帮你做出判断？」 ～冰风贤者祖巴冽

trans-unit.source: Flight
trans-unit.target: 舞空术

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature has flying.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: "Those who claim to know the world in its entirety rarely have the requisite perspective."\n—Ulmarus the Wise
trans-unit.target: 「放话说自己彻底了解世界的人，经常连所需的视野都没有。」 ～智者乌马勒

trans-unit.source: Frost Breath
trans-unit.target: 霜息

trans-unit.resname: M12·54 | Frost Breath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 横置至多两个目标生物。 这些生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: If you have to be stuck somewhere for a while, it's better to be stuck there with a friend.
trans-unit.target: 如果你被迫要在某处耗上一阵子，最好是能有个朋友一起耗。

trans-unit.source: Frost Titan
trans-unit.target: 冰霜泰坦

trans-unit.resname: M12·55 | Frost Titan | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}.\nWhenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME成为由对手操控的咒语或异能之目标时，除非该咒语或异能的操控者支付{2}，否则反击之。 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，横置目标永久物。 它于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: Harbor Serpent
trans-unit.target: 港湾巨蛇

trans-unit.resname: M12·56 | Harbor Serpent | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls an Island.)\nCARDNAME can't attack unless there are five or more Islands on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 海岛行者 （只要防御牌手操控海岛，此生物就不能被阻挡） 除非战场上有五个或更多海岛，否则CARDNAME不能攻击。

trans-unit.source: Like most giant monsters villagers worship as gods, it proves a fickle master.
trans-unit.target: 他是个喜怒无常的主子，就如同大多数被村民如神景仰的巨大怪兽一样。

trans-unit.source: Ice Cage
trans-unit.target: 寒冰槛

trans-unit.resname: M12·57 | Ice Cage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.\nWhen enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。 当所结附的生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，消灭CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: M12·58 | Jace, Memory Adept | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jace, Memory Adept
trans-unit.target: 记忆专家杰斯

trans-unit.resname: M12·58 | Jace, Memory Adept | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: +1: Draw a card. Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.\n0: Target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.\n-7: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.
trans-unit.target: +1：抓一张牌。目标牌手将其牌库顶牌置入其坟墓场。 0：目标牌手将其牌库顶的十张牌置入其坟墓场。 -7：任意数量的目标牌手各抓二十张牌。

trans-unit.source: Jace's Archivist
trans-unit.target: 杰斯的书库辖员

trans-unit.resname: M12·59 | Jace's Archivist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {U}, {T}: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
trans-unit.target: {U}，{T}：每位牌手各弃掉手牌，然后抓若干牌，其数量等同于牌手中以此法弃牌的最多数量。

trans-unit.source: "This is a sacred duty. Master Beleren's trust has bought an eternity of my loyalty."
trans-unit.target: 「这是个神圣任务。 贝连大师的信任值得我为他终生效命。」

trans-unit.source: Jace's Erasure
trans-unit.target: 杰斯的抹消

trans-unit.resname: M12·60 | Jace's Erasure | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw a card, you may have target player put the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓一张牌时，你可以令目标牌手将其牌库顶牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: "You should try to clear your mind of idle thoughts. And if you can't, I will."
trans-unit.target: 「你该试着清空停滞的思绪。 如果你没法子，我能作到。」

trans-unit.source: Levitation
trans-unit.target: 飘浮

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have flying.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: "Why fight over scraps of land when there's so much sky waiting to be claimed?"
trans-unit.target: 「有这么大一片天空可开拓，又为何要争夺细碎的土地？」

trans-unit.resname: M12·62 | Lord of the Unreal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lord of the Unreal
trans-unit.target: 虚境之王

trans-unit.resname: M12·62 | Lord of the Unreal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Illusion creatures you control get +1/+1 and have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的虚影生物得+1/+1并具有辟邪异能。 （它们不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.resname: M12·62 | Lord of the Unreal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The dream does not end until I say so."
trans-unit.target: 「梦要等我说结束，才算真的结束。」

trans-unit.source: Mana Leak
trans-unit.target: 魔力流失

trans-unit.resname: M12·63 | Mana Leak | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{3}，否则反击该咒语。

trans-unit.source: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.
trans-unit.target: 任何计划中最大的漏洞，即是假设你所知道的比敌人多。

trans-unit.source: Master Thief
trans-unit.target: 神偷

trans-unit.resname: M12·64 | Master Thief | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, gain control of target artifact for as long as you control CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，只要你操控CARDNAME，你便获得目标神器的操控权。

trans-unit.source: Possession is ten-tenths of the law.
trans-unit.target: 先抢先赢。

trans-unit.source: Merfolk Looter
trans-unit.target: 掠夺人鱼

trans-unit.resname: M12·65 | Merfolk Looter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.
trans-unit.target: 人鱼并不总知道自己要些什么，但他们相信找到时就会知道了。

trans-unit.source: Merfolk Mesmerist
trans-unit.target: 催眠人鱼

trans-unit.resname: M12·66 | Merfolk Mesmerist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {U}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {U}，{T}：目标牌手将他牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: "Don't you think if I saw a half-woman, half-fish with three glowing eyes, I'd have remembered?"\n—Drugo, town guard
trans-unit.target: 「你以为如果我见到个半是女人半是鱼、还有三只发亮眼睛的人，居然还可能会忘记吗？」 ～镇守卫筑革

trans-unit.source: Mind Control
trans-unit.target: 心灵操控

trans-unit.resname: M12·67 | Mind Control | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nYou control enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 你操控所结附的生物。

trans-unit.source: "Every primitive mind has a motive. Easy to find, and eminently exploitable."\n—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage
trans-unit.target: 「每个原始心灵都具有动机。 容易找到，也特别好利用。」 ～塔晋息法师诺言达

trans-unit.source: Mind Unbound
trans-unit.target: 心灵奔逸

trans-unit.resname: M12·68 | Mind Unbound | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a lore counter on CARDNAME, then draw a card for each lore counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，在CARDNAME上放置一个学问指示物，然后CARDNAME上每有一个学问指示物，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: The creations of the hand are confined by reality. The creations of the mind know no such limits.
trans-unit.target: 双手的创作受限于现实。 心灵的创作则没有极限。

trans-unit.source: Negate
trans-unit.target: 失效

trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标非生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.
trans-unit.target: 秘术大师很欣赏此等绝妙吊诡： 他们深沉又复杂的秘法会导出简单至极的结果～只需说出是或否两字的能力。

trans-unit.source: Phantasmal Bear
trans-unit.target: 幻象熊

trans-unit.resname: M12·70 | Phantasmal Bear | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。

trans-unit.source: "You know it to be false, but when its claws find you, what you know won't matter much at all."\n—Pol Jamaar, illusionist
trans-unit.target: 「你明知这不是真的，但当它向你挥爪，你知道些什么可一点也不重要。」 ～幻影师波贾玛

trans-unit.source: Phantasmal Dragon
trans-unit.target: 幻象巨龙

trans-unit.resname: M12·71 | Phantasmal Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。

trans-unit.source: Its hunger and ire are no less for being wrought of lies and mist.
trans-unit.target: 虽以谎言与雾气打造，其饥饿与愤怒可一点不少。

trans-unit.source: Phantasmal Image
trans-unit.target: 幻象身影

trans-unit.resname: M12·72 | Phantasmal Image | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an Illusion in addition to its other types and it gains "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一生物的复制品来进入战场，但它额外具有虚影此类别，且具有「当此生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。」

trans-unit.source: Ponder
trans-unit.target: 沉思

trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌，然后将它们以任意顺序放回。 你可以将你的牌库洗牌。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
trans-unit.target: 明日属于今天就为它作好准备的人。

trans-unit.source: Redirect
trans-unit.target: 移转

trans-unit.source: You may choose new targets for target spell.
trans-unit.target: 你可以为目标咒语选择新的目标。

trans-unit.source: "It's actually quite simple, but since you've only recently begun to walk upright, it may take some time to explain."\n—Jace Beleren, to Garruk Wildspeaker
trans-unit.target: 「其实这很简单，但既然你直着走路还没多久，可能得花点时间来解释。」 ～杰斯贝连告诉召兽使贾路

trans-unit.source: Skywinder Drake
trans-unit.target: 掠空龙兽

trans-unit.resname: M12·75 | Skywinder Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME can block only creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME只能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.source: It's so light and fragile that it can glide where the air is thinnest.
trans-unit.target: 他既轻又脆弱，就连在空气最稀薄的地方都能滑翔。

trans-unit.resname: M12·76 | Sphinx of Uthuun | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sphinx of Uthuun
trans-unit.target: 乌屯史芬斯

trans-unit.resname: M12·76 | Sphinx of Uthuun | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，展示你牌库顶的五张牌。 由任一对手将它们分成两堆。 将其中一堆置于你手上，另一堆置于你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Time Reversal
trans-unit.target: 时间逆转

trans-unit.resname: M12·77 | Time Reversal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library, then draws seven cards. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手将其手牌与坟墓场洗入其牌库，然后各抓七张牌。 放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "Any oaf can conquer a kingdom. It takes true power to conquer time."\n—Shai Fusan, archmage
trans-unit.target: 「再蠢的人都能征服个王国。 而要有真正的力量才能征服时间。」 ～大法师赛福桑

trans-unit.resname: M12·78 | Turn to Frog | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Turn to Frog
trans-unit.target: 化蛙术

trans-unit.resname: M12·78 | Turn to Frog | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature loses all abilities and becomes a 1/1 blue Frog until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物失去所有异能，并成为1/1蓝色蛙。

trans-unit.resname: M12·78 | Turn to Frog | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ribbit."
trans-unit.target: 「呱呱。」

trans-unit.source: Unsummon
trans-unit.target: 反召唤

trans-unit.source: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "It's nothing personal. I'd just prefer if you weren't."\n—Ashurel, voidmage
trans-unit.target: 「这不是针对你。 我还希望不是你呢。」 ～销法师阿休雷

trans-unit.resname: M12·80 | Visions of Beyond | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Visions of Beyond
trans-unit.target: 未来预视

trans-unit.resname: M12·80 | Visions of Beyond | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card. If a graveyard has twenty or more cards in it, draw three cards instead.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。如果某个坟墓场中有二十张牌或更多，则改为抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: M12·80 | Visions of Beyond | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The past is the foundation for all that exists in the present. We merely reconstruct what our ancestors have already discovered."\n—Sachimir, Sage of Memories
trans-unit.target: 「过去是现在所有东西的基础。 我们只是将祖先发现的所有东西重组一遍。」 ～记忆智者沙契弥

trans-unit.source: Blood Seeker
trans-unit.target: 觅血师

trans-unit.resname: M12·81 | Blood Seeker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物在对手的操控下进战场时，你可以令该牌手失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: A drop now is all he needs to find you later.
trans-unit.target: 现在流的这一滴血，就足以让他稍后找到你。

trans-unit.resname: M12·82 | Bloodlord of Vaasgoth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bloodlord of Vaasgoth
trans-unit.target: 法兹各血领

trans-unit.resname: M12·82 | Bloodlord of Vaasgoth | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)\nFlying\nWhenever you cast a Vampire creature spell, it gains bloodthirst 3.
trans-unit.target: 嗜血3 （如果对手本回合曾受过伤害，此生物进场时上面有三个+1/+1指示物。） 飞行 每当你施放一个吸血鬼生物咒语时，它获得嗜血3。

trans-unit.source: Bloodrage Vampire
trans-unit.target: 血怒吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: M12·83 | Bloodrage Vampire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手施放任何白色咒语时，你可以获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: The angel represents divine perfection; even the smallest feather is imbued with beauty and benevolence.
trans-unit.target: 天使代表了神之完美；就连最细的羽毛都盈满着美丽与优雅。

trans-unit.target: 帝国冠冕

trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature. Gain control of that creature instead if you control artifacts named Scepter of Empires and Throne of Empires.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：横置目标生物。 如果你操控名称为帝国权杖以及帝国王座的神器，则改为获得该生物的操控权。

trans-unit.resname: M12·203 | Crown of Empires | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "With this crown, assert your authority."\n—Crown inscription
trans-unit.target: 「此冠证你无上权威。」 ～冠冕铭文

trans-unit.source: Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)\nWhen CARDNAME attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 （如果此生物将分配的伤害足以消灭所有阻挡它的生物，你可以将它所剩余数量的伤害分配给防御牌手或鹏洛客。） 当CARDNAME攻击，在战斗结束时将它牺牲。

trans-unit.target: 每当牌手施放任何黑色咒语时，你可以获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.
trans-unit.target: 其弯弧好似生与死的纠结。

trans-unit.source: Dragon's Claw
trans-unit.target: 巨龙钩爪

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手施放任何红色咒语时，你可以获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "If there is a fire that never ceases to burn, it surely lies in the maw of a dragon."\n—Sarkhan Vol
trans-unit.target: 「如果有永不熄灭的火焰，就一定是在巨龙喉头。」 ～萨坎沃

trans-unit.source: Druidic Satchel
trans-unit.target: 德鲁伊背包

trans-unit.resname: M12·207 | Druidic Satchel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. If it's a land card, put that card onto the battlefield under your control. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：展示你的牌库顶牌。 如果它是生物牌，则将一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生生物放进战场。 如果它是地牌，则将该牌在你的操控下放进战场。 如果它是非生物且非地的牌，则你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.target: 永生琼浆

trans-unit.resname: M12·208 | Elixir of Immortality | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle CARDNAME and your graveyard into their owner's library.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：你获得5点生命。 将CARDNAME与你的坟墓场洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: M12·208 | Elixir of Immortality | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect."\n—Baron Sengir
trans-unit.target: 「瓶装的生命。 风味不太如我意，也不新鲜，但起码功效相同。」 ～辛格男爵

trans-unit.source: The only blow that matters is the killing blow.
trans-unit.target: 只有致命的一击才有意义。

trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+0/+3。 佩带{3} （{3}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上； 佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: "To my sword I owe my glory, but to my shield I owe my life."\n—Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge
trans-unit.target: 「我欠长剑一份荣誉，但我欠盾牌一条性命。」 ～北境神圣武士莎雷娜

trans-unit.source: Kraken's Eye

trans-unit.target: 每当牌手施放任何蓝色咒语时，你可以获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: It's seen the wonders of entire worlds trapped in the depths of a bottomless ocean.
trans-unit.target: 它见过整个世界陷入无底汪洋深渊的神奇景象。

trans-unit.source: Manalith
trans-unit.target: 魔力巨石

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Planeswalkers seek out great monuments throughout the Multiverse, knowing that their builders were unknowingly drawn by the convergence of mana in the area.
trans-unit.target: 鹏洛客在多重宇宙间寻找巨大纪念碑，因为他们晓得其建造者是不自觉地受该处聚集的法术力吸引而来。

trans-unit.source: Pentavus
trans-unit.target: 五节兽

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.\n{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Put a 1/1 colorless Pentavite artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.\n{1}, Sacrifice a Pentavite: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有五个+1/+1指示物。 {1}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：将一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的分节衍生神器生物放置进场。 {1}，牺牲一个分节：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.target: 水银护身符

trans-unit.target: {4}，{T}：你可以将一张生物牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Those who examine the amulet too closely have been known to become part of its ornate carvings.
trans-unit.target: 据知太贴近把玩这护身符的人，会变成其上华丽雕饰的一部分。

trans-unit.source: It has to deliberate a moment on the best way to break your face.
trans-unit.target: 它必须花点时间挑选把你脸打碎的最好方法。

trans-unit.target: {T}：CARDNAME对目标牌手造成1点伤害。 如果你操控名称为帝国冠冕以及帝国王座的神器，则改为它对该牌手造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: M12·216 | Scepter of Empires | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "With this scepter, smite your enemies."\n—Scepter inscription
trans-unit.target: 「此杖助你扫荡仇敌。」 ～权杖铭文

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将该牌横置进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。 当CARDNAME死去时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 无尽日晷

trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: End the turn. Activate this ability only during your turn. (Exile all spells and abilities on the stack. Discard down to your maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：结束本回合。 你只可以于自己的回合中起动此异能。 （放逐堆叠中的所有咒语与异能。 你将手牌弃掉、直到满足手牌上限为止。 生物上的伤害消失，并且注记着「本回合」与「直到回合结束」的效应均结束。）

trans-unit.source: Swiftfoot Boots

trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有辟邪与敏捷异能。 （它不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标，且它受你操控时便能攻击与{T}。） 佩带{1} （{1}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上； 佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.target: 索蓝魔像

trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME被结附，它便得+2/+2并具有飞行、先攻和践踏异能。

trans-unit.source: The golems of the ancient Thran still draw power in ways that baffle the artificers of today.
trans-unit.target: 古老索蓝帝国的魔像是用什么方法得以不断获取能量至今，仍是当代神器师未解之谜。
